issue.title: [CF 1011] How to display a count up-to a finite value
issue.body:

I'm trying to create a bar that tracks a warlocks [BurningEmberParts] from zero to 40.  I've created a Condition Icon that tracks [BurningEmberParts] but I need to somehow apply this to a bar that has a min-max value of 0-40.  is this possible?
